formula.name: Mandelbar
formula.reference: Xrn = (3 * Xi2 - Xr2) * Xr + Cr; Xin = (3 * Xr2 - Xi2) * Xi + Ci;
formula.perturbation: xrn = cr - xr * (3 * Xr2 + xr2) + 3 * Xr * (xi2 + 2 * Xi * xi - xr2) + 3 * xr * (Xi2 + 2 * Xi * xi + xi2); xin = 6 * Xr * Xi * xr + 3 * Xi * xr2 - 3 * Xi2 * xi - 3 * Xi * xi2 + 3 * Xr2 * xi + 6 * Xr * xr * xi + 3 * xr2 * xi - xi2 * xi + ci;
